pullRequest.title: [Exam] Add/Import modeling Exercises
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Server: I added multiple integration tests (Spring) related to the features
 Server: I added @PreAuthorize and check the course groups for all new REST Calls (security)
 Server: I implemented the changes with a good performance and prevented too many database calls
 Server: I documented the Java code using JavaDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple integration tests (Jest) related to the features
 Client: I added authorities to all new routes and check the course groups for displaying navigation elements (links, buttons)
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Motivation and Context
As part of the artemis exams, we want to also support modeling exercises, by creating new ones but also by having the ability to import modeling exercises. In addition to this, we want to import modeling exercises into courses.
Description

 Create the import modal for Modeling Exercises
 Add Pagable Search calls for the import modal
 Adapt the modeling-exercise-update.component.ts for import and exam mode
 Adapt the modeling-exercise-update.component.html for import and exam mode
 Add the import routes for modeling exercises for course and exam
 Update the ModelingExerciseResolver to handle requests from exams
 Create the server rest call
 Create the abstract class ExerciseImportService, let TextExerciseImportService extend ExerciseImportService
 Create the ModelingExerciseImportService, extend ExerciseImportService
 Create the database call required for the import service
 Update the exerciseGroup row buttons to handle deletion of modeling exercises

Steps for Testing
Firstly, make sure importing text exercises still works as expected for courses and exams. There was some code refactoring involved here, but no functionality change.
To test the modeling exercises:
Course:

Log in to Artemis
Navigate to Course Administration
Create a modeling exercise in your course. Add every field possible including the example submission and example solution
Import this exercise into the course using the import modeling exercise button.
Delete the original exercise. Everything should still work and be visible for the imported exercise.


Exam:

Log in to Artemis
Navigate to Course Administration
Create an exam and set it up with two exercise groups, let it start soon.
Add one modeling exercise to one exercise group.
Import a modeling exercise to the other exercise group.
Start the exam.
Do some actions and save

Screenshots
Course Import Modeling Exercise

Import Modeling Exercise Modal

Exercise Group Modeling Exercise Actions

Modeling Exercises in the exam:

commit.message:
Add server side capability to search for all text exercises
Where the user has access to the course or is Admin
Enhance edit-text-exercise form to support importing exercises

Complete importing text exercises
The import is done by doing a hard copy of every entity and its child entities

Reduce redundant DB access
gradlew spotlessApply

Remove exam search appearences to fix visual bug.
Solving the bug in not in the scope of this PR and will be done in the PR which enables importing exercises into exams
Add grading instructions to TextExercise Import
Refactor code and reduce database access
fix bug when the pages displayed are unlimited and go beyond the boundaries of the container view
Merge branch 'feature/import-text-exercises' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into feature/import-text-exercises

Refactor code, add Course title pipe for import modal.
URL check for Exam mode import
Add import text exercise to client
change db query to include exam exercises in the results

fix failing test by improving Exercise validation robustness

add integration tests for different imports
Course/Course Course/Exam Exam/Course Exam/Exam

Fix Merge Issues
Adapt Programming Exercise getAll function to work with modified modal. In this version of the modal, the number of pages are limited to 10 so that it stays within the container view
Add search functionality for modeling exercises

Merge branch 'develop' into feature/import-modelling-exercises
Resolved using the state from develop
